​Vaddiparthi Saketh​​|​​AE22B061​|​Indian Institute of​​Technology Madras​

​SCHOLASTIC​
​ACHIEVEMENTS​
​● Secured Rank​​3295​​among 1.59L applicants in​​Jee​​Advance Examination 2022​​which was conducted by IIT​​Bombay.​
​● Bagged​​AIR 269​​In​​Andhra EAPCET​,​​AIR 877​​in​​Telangana​​EAMCET,​​providing state university admission eligibility.​
​● Selected for​​State Level​ ​WIZ  National Spell Bee​​2016-17 and 2015-16 and was given​​4 Star performance​​rating​.​
​● Secured​​State Rank​​32​​in​​International Olympiad​​of Mathematics​​in 2017 conducted by Silver zone Foundation.​
​● Solved​​600+ DSA Problems​​from different coding platforms​​Like LeetCode, GeeksforGeeks, CodeChef, HackerRank​
​COURSES AND SKILLS​
​COURSEWORK​
​Data Structures and Algorithm in Python​
​Probability, Statistics and Stochastic Process​
​Machine learning in Python*​
​Database Management System​
​Introduction to Programming language C​
​Information Technology​
​SKILLS​
​●​​Programming Languages :​​Python ,SQL, JavaScript,​​C, HTML , CSS​
​●​​Frameworks & Libraries​:​​Numpy, Pandas, NLTK,​
​Matplotlib, seaborn, FastAPI, PySpark, scikit-learn,​
​LangChain,LangGraph, BeautifulSoup,Generative AI​
​APIs, PyTorch, Whisper ,HuggingFace Transformers​
​●​​Tools:​​Git, GitHub, MongoDB, PostgreSQL,MySQL, VS​​code, MS Office​
​Vector DB’s,Fastapi, Apache,Power BI,Miro,Docker,Render,AWS,Canva​
​●​​Soft Skills​: Problem-solving, leadership,Adaptability,Design-Thinking​
​PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE​
​AI/ML INTERN​
​@Runverve​
​(June’25 – August’25)​
​TECH STACK:​​streamlit, pandas, psycopg2, sentence_transformers,​​qdrant_client, asyncpraw, asyncio, google.generativeai,gtts​
​● Designed a Streamlit​​Sports Recovery Semantic Search​​tool​​using Qdrant and SentenceTransformer embeddings​​for​​fast,​
​accurate​​semantic lookup, scraped 100+ Reddit posts​​with metadata, storing them as structured vectors for​​deeper retrieval​.​
​● Integrated Neon PostgreSQL to​​log feedback​​and apply​​+0.5/–0.5 cosine boosts​​to refine,​​improve search​​accuracy by 80%​.​
​● Added Google Gemini insights to generate​​high-quality​,​​AI-driven​​recovery expert explanations aligned with​​user queries.​
​● Used​​asyncpraw​​for async Reddit ingestion and applied​​keyword filtering to maintain strong accuracy +​​domain​​relevance​.​
​AI Application​
​Engineer Intern​
​@Concave Tech​
​(May’25 – July’25)​
​TECH STACK :​​Python, FastAPI, Power Automate, MySQL,​​PHP, Qdrant, Sentence Transformers, Pytest, Miro, Agile​
​● Implemented​​PRD​s, Power Automate workflows, robust​​Python scripts for​​document generation​​and​​form validation​​using​
​pytest, while contributing within Agile Scrum cycles and working with data annotation tools to enhance delivery effectiveness.​
​● Delivered FastAPI-based REST APIs,​automated complex​​MySQL workflows​​using PHP+cron jobs, and engineered​​a semantic​
​field-mapping system using Sentence Transformers and Qdrant, achieving​​70% accuracy​​while​​cutting hours​​of manual work​.​
​PROJECTS​
​DIABETES​
​PREDICTOR​
​Tech Stack:​​FastAPI, Uvicorn, PyTorch, Scikit-learn,​​NumPy, Pandas, Joblib, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Docker, AWS EC2​
​● Created a​​high-accuracy​​diabetes prediction system​​using autoencoders for nonlinear feature extraction and dimensionality​
​reduction, achieving consistent and robust​ ​99% recall, 97% precision​​for the diabetic class with a Random Forest classifier.​
​●​​Optimized model performance​​using​​GridSearchCV​​with​​5-fold cross-validation​, improving generalization on imbalanced​
​data (​170:20 class ratio​) and validated through feature importance analysis, correlation heatmaps, ROC-AUC evaluation and​
​confusion matrices.Containerized the FastAPI inference service using Docker and deployed on​​AWS EC2 with Elastic IP.​
​ENTERPRISE BANKING​
​AI AGENT​
​Tech Stack:​​Python,HTML,CSS,JavaScript FastAPI, Docker,​​AWS (EC2), PyTorch, Hugging Face Transformers, FAISS, SQLite, Git.​
​●  Built a​​full-stack, production-grade AI system​​integrating backend ML services, data pipelines, UI, and cloud deployment.​
​●  Fine-tuned​​DistilBERT​(≈​84% accuracy​)​​on Banking77,​​BERT-NER​​on CoNLL-2003 (​0.048 loss​)for financial​​intent+entity extraction.​
​●  Optimized inference on​​AWS t3.small (2GB RAM)​​using​​Docker​​and​​swap memory​, enabling parallel transformer execution​
​on constrained CPU hardware without OOM errors and engineered a highly robust,rule-based hybrid​​RAG​​+ SQL​​architecture​
​using​​FAISS​​and a deterministic router, ensuring zero​​hallucinations by strictly​​separating policy retrieval​​from transactions.​
​AI MULTI AGENT​
​WORKFLOW​
​Tech Stack :​​LangGraph,FastAPI,Google Gemini,Faiss,Tavily​​Search API, WebSockets, PostgreSQL, CSS, JavaScript,Render,Docker​
​●  Engineered a​​full stack​​multi-agent system​​using​​LangGraph and Gemini with robust autonomous​​self-correcting​​loops​.​
​●  Designed a FAISS+PostgreSQL​​RAG​​pipeline enabling​​agents to synthesize insights from​​Tavily web search​​and​​PDF uploads.​
​●  Engineered a real-time​​WebSocket dashboard​​(HTML5,​​Tailwind, JS) to visualize agent reasoning and document processing.​
​● Designed a scalable UI in Canva with live progress tracking,​​computed report generation​,​​deployed​​on​​Render using Docker.​
​MED-MISTRAL AI​
​Tech Stack :​​Python, PyTorch, Hugging Face(Transformers, PEFT, TRL), Mistral-7B, QLoRA,WandB, Docker, HTML, CSS, JavaScript​
​●Created a​​full-stack Medical AI application​​using​​Mistral-7B-v0.1​​for real-time medical Q&A by​​fine-tuning​​on MedAlpaca data​
​using QLoRA+Hugging Face PEFT,achieving a​​final training​​loss of 0.89​,Dockerizing for cross-platform deployment​​(CUDA/MPS)​.​
​●​​Optimized model inference using 4-bit NF4 quantization​,​​reducing memory usage by​​~65% (from 15GB to 5GB)​​to enable​
​efficient execution on consumer-grade hardware, integrated with a responsive HTML/CSS/JS​​UI​​and a​​FastAPI backend​.​
​MULTI-MODEL​
​SUPPORT CLASSIFIER​
​Tech Stack :​​PyTorch, BERT, ResNet18, Whisper,PIL,​​gTTS, Streamlit, TorchVision/Torchaudio, Pandas, Pillow, FFmpeg, Python​
​● Designed a​​multi-modal ticket​​processing pipeline​​to analyse text, image, audio inputs for accurate category-classification.​
​● Utilized​​BERT tokenizer​​for advanced text encoding,​​TorchVision transforms for image preprocessing, and Whisper for audio​
​transcription and trained a​​dual-stream PyTorch model​​fusing robust  CNN-driven visual insights for unified decision-making.​
​● Deployed via​​Streamlit for an interactive user interface​​to upload text, images or audio for classification and quick response.​
​POSITIONS OF RESPONSIBILITY​
​Design and Ambience,​
​SOC​​1​​,(Coordinator-CORE)​
​(June’23 – June’25)​
​●Spearheaded​​D&A​​6​​strategy for SOC events, translating​​creative vision​​into high-impact that elevated audience​​engagement.​
​● Owned complete​​event branding​-from apparel and merchandise​​to posters+ banners—collaborating cross functionally with​
​SOC teams and organizers to deliver seamless execution for flagship events including​​Sportify, Agrata,Deans&Schroeter’s​.​
​●​​Led and mentored 12 coordinators​​under two core​​teams,driving​​skill development​,delegation, quality​​in design execution.​
​O&IP,Shaastra,Coordinator​
​(May’23- April’24)​
​●​​Coordinated a 30-member​​O&IP team, providing operational​​support, and​​managing​​end-to-end event logistics​​including​
​venue booking, equipment rental, transportation, and​​timely material delivery​​for events conducted by​​D&B​​4​​and C&L​​5​​.​
​EXTRA-CURRICULARS​
​SPORTS​
​Basketball​
​● Selected​​among the elite top 20 players​​in the NSO​​Basketball trials nationally with​​strong performance​,competed​​in Inter​
​School Basketball Tournament at St. Patrick’s High School, Secunderabad and Indian School Basketball League​​national level​.​
​●​​Secured Gold​​in Inter-Hostel Basketball Tournament​​organized by Deans and Schroeter’s showcasing leadership excellence.​
​Co-Curricular and​
​Social Endeavours​
​●​​Bagged​​1​​st​​Prize​​i​n Quiz​​Competition​​by Nagarjuna​​Nagar Welfare Committee and Participated in​​SRISHTI​​2K17​​by​​Street​
​Cause Eforce,​​showcasing solar and wind energy demo.​​Contributed by spreading awareness and raise funds for the cause of​
​hearing impaired​​And​ ​Participated in​​HSBC Train Green​​Programme​​in 2015-16 and was the Environment Change​​Agent.​
​* – Ongoing Courses | 1 – Sports Organisation Committee | 2 – National Sports Organisation | 3 – Telangana Basketball Association | O&IP – Operation and infrastructure​
​Planning |   4 - Design and Build | 5 - Coding and Logic | 6- Design and Ambience​
